subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort palace is known for its marble inlaid work and is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में पूछी जाती है बड़ी फोट पॉलिस का नाम, जो मालका प्रचारित करता है?
explanation_en:
Amber Fort and Hawa Mahal are both famous for their marble inlaid work, but Hawa Mahal, also known as Palace of Winds, is specifically located in Jaipur.

जोड़ी को राजस्थान के मार्चर के लिखित किया गया है?
explanation_hi: अम्बर फोट और हाउ माहल हों के लिखित किया गया है, लेकिन हाउ माहल को पूछी गई है।
explanation_en:
Amber Fort and Hawa Mahal are both famous for their intricate work, but Hawa Mahal, also known as the Palace of Winds, is specifically located in Jaipur.
जोड़ी की उद्यत के लिखित किया है, हाउ माहल को पूछी गई है।
